organization.billing_failed: An error occured while updating your billing information.
organization.admin_description: Admins can add and remove users from the organization. They can also create and edit content.
organization.change_roles_ad_label: Get precise control over roles in your organization. Upgrade and give others admin authority to change peoples' roles, or remove them from the organization altogether.
organization.collaborator_description: Collaborators can create and edit content.
organization.confirm_role_change: Are you sure you want to change your role?
organization.custom_font_description: Have a custom font you'd like to use across all your content? Paste the same @font-face CSS code from your website.
organization.custom_font_learnMore: Learn More About Implementing Custom Fonts
organization.changing_role_owner_to_admin: Changing your role to an Admin will make it so you can’t see billing info.
organization.changing_role_owner_to_contributor: Changing your role to a Collaborator will make it so you can’t see billing info or change others' roles.
organization.changing_role_admin_to_contributor: Changing your role to a Collaborator will make it so you can't change others' roles.
organization.invite_role_feature_edit_hubs_within: Edit Any Hubs within This Hub
organization.lose_access: You will lose access to all organization content.
organization.organization_help: Organizations help you work with others on the same content.
organization.organization_info: Organization owners have access to billing information. Owners and admins can add, and remove people from the organization. Owners, admins, and collaborators can create and edit content.
organization.owner_description: Owners can access to billing information, add and remove users from the organization, and create and edit content.
organization.modal_invalid_email: The email for your invitation is invalid. Edit the email, and resend it, or, if you don’t wish to send it, select the Close button.
organization.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove yourself from the organization?
